attributes.action: we would like you to change the salmon act of 1986
attributes.background:
we would like you to get rid of the salmon act of 1986. i think it is totally outrageous, like why is it a law to hold salmon suspicously
#itsamockery
#getitgone

rejection.details: You would need to be clear how you want this Act to be changed or repealed, and fisheries management is now a matter for the Scottish Parliament, so we could not accept a petition calling for changes to legislation in this area, as that would be a matter for the Scottish Parliament.
